name: Advanced Physics
description: Comprehensive physics course covering mechanics, thermodynamics, and quantum physics fundamentals.

name: Financial Accounting
description: Introduction to accounting principles, financial statements, and bookkeeping practices for business management.

name: Modern Indian History
description: Study of Indian history from the medieval period to independence and post-independence developments.

name: Java Programming
description: Object-oriented programming with Java, including data structures, algorithms, and software development practices.

name: Organic Chemistry
description: Advanced chemistry focusing on organic compounds, reactions, and molecular structures.

name: Business Economics
description: Economic principles applied to business decision-making, market analysis, and financial planning.
